source_objects.title: Mobile Development
source_objects.description: Learn how to build your mobile app for iOS, Android and Kindle.

items.title: Advanced Android: Create a Real-REST API Client Application
items.headline: Quick Course to learn how to build a beautiful Wallpaper Android App with Retrofit, GSON, Realm, ButterKnife, Glide
objectives_summary: Create a real application to up to Google Play Store
How to use ButterKnife for binding view
How to use Glide 4 to load image from server

items.title: Learn Android Wear Programming
items.headline: Guide to learn and create Android Wear Programs using Android Studio and Eclipse
objectives_summary: Students will be able to create and run Android wear programs
Students will learn about Android wear, UI patterns and Design Principles etc
Students will be able to run wear programs on both Android Studio and Eclipse IDE

items.title: Introduction to Xamarin.Android
items.headline: Learn the foundations of building Android app in C# with Xamarin
objectives_summary: Upon completion of this course students will be able to: create a project, build an Activity's UI, add behavior to an Activity, read and retrieve results from an Activity, and update the Android SDK

visible_instructors.job_title: ​Product Manager at Uber and Tesla, Stanford MBA

items.headline: Product Management Videos, Insights, Success Metrics
objectives_summary: What Products are, how you manage product, and what defines and makes product successful
Product Manager role (PM), key skills and responsibilities of Product Manager
What distinguishes good Product Manager from bad Product Manager

items.title: The Complete iOS9 Auto Layout Course
items.headline: The goal is to raise your AutoLayout confidence levels and design iOS interfaces that use space  effectively
objectives_summary: Learn to confidently build and maintain App Interfaces that deal with different iPhone screen sizes, orientations and levels of complexity

items.title: Build Great IOS Apps (Swift)
items.headline: Learn quick and fast by Building great iOS apps using swift
objectives_summary: Build great iOS apps
Learn Swift
Learn UIKit framework

items.title: Mobile App Development in 27 Minutes: iOS App

visible_instructors.name: Grant
visible_instructors.title: Grant Klimaytys
visible_instructors.job_title: Former Google Engineer and Professional App Developer

items.headline: The speed learners guide to native iOS development. BONUS lessons included!
objectives_summary: Create an iOS app very quickly
Understand the separation that Xcode has between Swift code and the GUI (storyboards)
How to show and interact with images in an iOS app

items.title: Introduction to Android Volley Programming
items.headline: Introduction to Android Volley Programming
objectives_summary: Install and configure android studio
Download and setup android volley library
Use android volley library

items.title: Learn Flutter & Dart by doing - part 1

visible_instructors.name: Abdulaziz
visible_instructors.title: Abdulaziz Alshamran
visible_instructors.job_title: I am a senior programmer with a great passion for teaching

items.headline: Build your first project in flutter
objectives_summary: Create a new class, and a new function
Create widgets
OOP

items.title: Swift from scratch - learn programming on iOS
items.headline: Learn the basics of new language! Create fast, safe and interactive apps with no programming experience!
objectives_summary: The Swift syntax
Basic programming techniques and constructions
Key elements of the language

items.title: Creating iPhone & iPad Apps Training - No Coding Required
items.headline: Learn How To Create IOS Apps And Never Do A Hard Days Work Again.Zero Coding Needed in this ios app development tutorial
objectives_summary: Everything you need to develop iOS apps for the iPhone and iPad
106 lectures divided into 27 chapters covering everything from designing to coding to publishing apps in the app store
Descriptions on how to use the iPhone and iPad features and limitations to your advantage

items.title: Creating your First Android Application from Scratch
items.headline: A complete tour on how to create and publish an Android Application and Game in less than a few hours using AppsGeyser
objectives_summary: Develop a basic Android Application and Game
Understand how to publish an Android app/game to the Amazon AppStore
Understand how to generate revenue from app downloads and advertisements

items.title: A Professional APP Development Course for iPhone and Android
items.headline: Learn how to develop apps for Wordpress sites, here you will be able to build apps for website, blog,magazine and store
objectives_summary: Ability to Build a Professional  App
A Good Knowledge By  Web App And Mobile App
Ability To Export Final work Of Apps Through APK File To Be Execute App

items.title: Create iPhone Apps from Scratch with iOS7 – Starter Course
items.headline: Use a Mac or PC to create your first iPhone app using Xcode 5. No programming experience required to learn Objective C
objectives_summary: Learn Objective-C Programming
Explore Xcode 5 and iOS 7.0
Create Your First iPhone App

items.title: Simple Game Programming From Scratch with libGDX and java
items.headline: With this course, we are going to build a "flappy bird like" game by libgdx and java from scratch!
objectives_summary: You can build a "flappy bird like" game from scratch.
You will learn basic concepts of game development and libgdx.
